questions.quote: Kramer, I just want to thank you again for last night, you really saved me.
Hey look, I just chalked down the message. I didn't know I was required to capture the mood of each caller.
That's good stuff, and you can never have too much ice. Alright, I'll tell you what I'll do. You can co-host the party with me, under one condition. No Jerry. Jerry is not invited.
Ohhh, maaan!! It's over! The Kramer name is finished! I'm never goin' to procreate--
It failed here! Because, here, every time you turn on a TV, all you see is four morons sitting round an apartment, whining about their dates!
I'm going to call Gino, you're going to see him, and we're going to get that haircut fixed up.
But I'm keeping it. As much as I hate the idea of being a van guy, it's much better than hanging out here with the nocturnal dirt people.
I've been thinking about her, I just cashed some of her checks.
I've tried. We don't have it. But maybe the two of us, working together at full capacity, could do the job of one normal man.
I, uh, just think it's a little unusual. Two people to sit on one side...and leave the other side empty.
